name: Baguette
description: Crisp, long French bread with a light, airy crumb.

name: Croissant
description: Buttery, flaky pastry with layers and a delicate texture.

name: Focaccia
description: Italian flatbread with a soft crumb and savory herb topping.

name: Ciabatta
description: Rustic Italian bread with a crisp crust, open crumb, and chewy texture.

name: Brioche
description: Soft, rich bread made with butter and eggs for a slightly sweet flavor.

name: Cereale
description: Italian bread with a mix of flours and seeds for a hearty, nutty taste.
